titleStmt.title: The lamented lovers: or, The young men and maiden's grief for the unhappy tragedy of this unfortunate couple. To the tune of Frantick lover. Licensed according to order. My love I come to thee.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "You damsels now of beauty might ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
